summary: Explore the diverse wonders of the Sn√¶fellsnes Peninsula, often called "Iceland in Miniature" for its concentration of landscapes from around the country. schedule.title: Ytri Tunga Beach
schedule.description: Visit this golden sand beach (rare in volcanic Iceland) known for its resident seal colony. The seals can often be spotted lounging on the rocks just offshore, especially during low tide.

Harbor seal colony visible throughout the year
Best viewing at low tide when seals rest on the rocks near shore
Short walk from the parking area to the beach
Binoculars helpful but not essential

notes: The Sn√¶fellsnes Peninsula offers a perfect finale to your Iceland Ring Road adventure, showcasing many of the landscape features you've seen throughout your trip in one compact area.
